name: Hemp Backpack Large - 18 litres
description:
This large Hemp Backpack is handloomed by women artisans in Nepal. The YKK metal zippers have an added hand-braided hemp puller. 

With 3 spacious pockets and the ability to hold a 15.5” screen, you will look fashionable while also showing your support for our environment. 

We recommend hand wash with neutral PH soap and cold water. Air dry in the shade.
content:
This large Hemp Backpack is handloomed by women artisans in Nepal. The YKK metal zippers have an added hand-braided hemp puller. 

With 3 spacious pockets and the ability to hold a 15.5” screen, you will look fashionable while also showing your support for our environment. 

We recommend hand wash with neutral PH soap and cold water. Air dry in the shade.

product_details.value:
Outer Fabric :  80% Hemp, 20% Cotton
• Outer fabric: Hemp-cotton
• Inner Fabric: 100% Organic Cotton
• Dimension: 11.5*7*16
• Fits upto 15.5" laptop
• Gender: Unisex
• Capacity: 18 Litres
We recommend hand wash with neutral PH soap and cold water. Air dry in the shade.
